snippet: RATNER--Michael. It is with great sorrow that we join the Ratner family in mourning the loss of our dear friend Michael Ratner. Michael had a lifelong commitment to social justice and was a champion for those who did not have one. He defended the rights of suspects held without judicial review and worked to end wholesale stop and frisk policies in New York City, among many other causes. He was a brilliant civil liberties attorney and a beloved brother, husband, father and friend to many. He will be greatly missed. MaryAnne Gilmartin Forest City Ratner 1/3
